entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 10:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow near noon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
